attributes.action: Instruct local councils to adopt all roads in their area.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have lived in the same bungalow since 1969, and have spent long hours filling potholes. There are only 6 bungalows in the road and all but one are inhabited by OAPs. We are getting to old to do this work. Considering our POLL Tax is astronomical, this should be covered by what we pay. Is the only work that gets done on Council Estates?
